Nyaaya | Technology Internship | New Delhi, India | ONSITE, INTERN , http://nyaaya.in

Nyaaya is Indiaâ€™s first free online searchable repository of every central and state law. Our mission is to provide an accessible, user friendly and single window platform which not only documents, but also explains all Indian laws.
